projects.name: Linkinize: Ultimate Bookmark Manager for Teams
projects.description: Linkinize is a powerful bookmark management tool designed specifically for teams and businesses. It allows users to easily share and collaborate on bookmarks, making it faster and more efficient to find the links they need. With features like instant search, multi-workspace access, and customizable tags, Linkinize helps teams stay organized and productive. It also offers encryption for added security and integrates with tools like Confluence and SAML for seamless user management.

projects.name: Post-Rock Nation
projects.description: Postrock Nation is a platform dedicated to the exploration and celebration of post-rock music. It serves as a comprehensive directory and community for post-rock enthusiasts, featuring a vast database of bands, albums, and tracks. Users can discover new music, explore playlists, and engage with the community to share their thoughts and favorite post-rock tunes. There over 8000 Post-Rock tracks, albums and artists live on the platform.

projects.name: Kament.io
projects.description: Kament.iois a browser extension designed to enable comments on YouTube videos where the commenting feature has been disabled by the video owner or YouTube. The philosophy behind Kament.iois to promote freedom of speech by allowing users to engage in discussions on public content. The extension is available for both Chrome and Firefox browsers.

projects.name: GoTow: Smart Towing Management System
projects.description: GoTow is an all-in-one towing management solution which handles entire operations of a towing company in a single web application solution. It consists of components for Admin, Billing, Customer, Customer Support, and Job Management. GoTow is being used by known towing services providers in Malaysia. GoTow also comes with a companion Android App which connects mechanics & drivers to their employer towing company. They receive jobs directly on their mobile phone.
